code: import{Typography}from'@material-ui/core';import GridContainer from'components/Grid/GridContainer';import GridItem from'components/Grid/GridItem';import ViewInfoActionModal from'components/ReactTableActions/ViewInfo/ViewInfoActionModal';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ViewUnitInfoModal=function ViewUnitInfoModal(_ref){var viewInfo=_ref.viewInfo,closeViewInfoModal=_ref.closeViewInfoModal,info=_ref.info;var id_unidad=info.id_unidad,codigo_unidad=info.codigo_unidad,descripcion_unidad=info.descripcion_unidad;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ViewInfoActionModal,{open:viewInfo,handleCloseModal:closeViewInfoModal,modalTitle:"Informacion de Unidad",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(GridContainer,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GridItem,{xs:12,md:6,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"body1",gutterBottom:true,children:["ID: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:id_unidad})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GridItem,{xs:12,md:6,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"body1",gutterBottom:true,children:["Codigo Unidad: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:codigo_unidad})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GridItem,{xs:12,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"body1",gutterBottom:true,children:["Descripcion: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:descripcion_unidad})]})})]})});};export default ViewUnitInfoModal;

sourcesContent: import { Typography } from '@material-ui/core' import GridContainer from 'components/Grid/GridContainer' import GridItem from 'components/Grid/GridItem' import ViewInfoActionModal from 'components/ReactTableActions/ViewInfo/ViewInfoActionModal' const ViewUnitInfoModal = ({ viewInfo, closeViewInfoModal, info }) => { const { id_unidad, codigo_unidad, descripcion_unidad } = info return ( ID: {id_unidad} Codigo Unidad: {codigo_unidad} Descripcion: {descripcion_unidad} } /> ) } export default ViewUnitInfoModal
